idea: Brick By Brick is a fitness apparel brand, manufacturer and E-commerce store headquartered in Navi Mumbai, India. Our mission is to bring global fitness fashion trends to indian market with affordability while keeping quality and style at its best, which promotes fitness and health simultaneously. Excellent touch and feel with a refined finish are just some of the few qualities promised with every garment bought from Brick by Brick. We promise to keep up with our goal of providing each one of our customers with nothing but the best in terms of not just design but durability.
name: BRICK BY BRICK CLOTHING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Hi, I'm Abhishek Dattarm Javrat. I wanted to start a business in the field of IoT. 

I have products that I develop which can convert your ordinary home into a smart home with no extra effort. By just installing and doing some connections you can control your home appliances over the internet from anywhere in the world. control your home appliances with our app, voice control(Alexa), and manual switches. You do not need to change your home lights and fans. with our one product, you can control 8 different appliances and two fans with the speed changing capability.
name: Inflonix Tech PVT LTD

idea: We building an InsurTech Saas platform which will help insurance agents manage their insurance agency business more efficiently and effectivly.
name: AMASAN INSURTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: With our start-up,  HRTailor, we want to make HR Operations accessible, convenient and affordable for Start-ups and Small & Medium Enterprises. In HRTailor, we provide the client with an Online HR Manager along with a custom developed online HRMS system. This combination allows us to outsource the client’s day to day HR activities with ease and at extremely low costs. With limited resources, we have already managed to completely digitize the capabilities of HR Operations and make them available to everyone at a much lower cost with much better usability.
name: SKAD BUSINESS SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
IPC Healthcare Pvt. Ltd. is a science-led healthcare company with a special objective (purpose) to help people do more, feel better & live longer.

IPC aspires to aid the community in leading a healthy life through two parallel objectives: formulating, developing and commercializing PPE kit, Surgicals Items, medicines & delivering affordable and accessible medication that satisfies (caters) to urgent medical needs.
name: IPC HEALTHCARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We strive to be India's most customer-centric student financial services provider! Our student loan platform aspires to democratise education for all, especially for households that belong to humble socio-economic backgrounds!

idea:
We “Candour Retail LLP” is a firm engaged in Manufacturing and Trading of the high-quality array of Mobile accessories, Neckband, Power bank, Chargers, car charger, Cables, Earphones & Bluetooth Speakers or Smart Gadgets under its Brand “Be The Wind”. Since our establishment in 2019 at Mumbai, India, we have been able to meet customer’s varied needs by providing products that are widely appreciated for their durability, compact size and portable. Under the strict direction of “Mrs. Jigna Patel" (CEO), we have achieved an alleged name in the industry. 

Owing to our expertise, we have been able to offer our customers with the quality-assured range of products in varied specifications. Owing to following reasons, we have been able to outshine others in this highly competitive market:

1. Talented workforce
2. Complete client satisfaction
3. Transparent dealings
4. Ethical business policies
5. Wide distribution network
6. Competitive pricing structure
7. Timely delivery
name: CANDOUR RETAIL LLP

idea: To carry on the business of marketing, trading and act as consultants in the business relating to hydroponics, indoor/outdoor farming, Ayurvedic medicines and other items related to food and beverages and other related items.
name: AGLOWSCIENCES MARKETING LLP

idea: InternKhoj is a digital platform that aims to provide relevant skills and relevant skills and realistic experience    to students through internship
